meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Ken Harrison Linda Williams Richard Gelb Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #499.

td.p: Ken Harrison, a computer programmer from Cincinnati, Ohio
Linda Williams, an engineering reports clerk from Pasadena, California
Richard Gelb, a writer from New York City (whose 1-day cash winnings total $2,800)

tr.td: AUTOMOBILES
JEWELRY
"B" MOVIES
MAN IN SPACE
OLD TESTAMENT
DIRTY WORDS

Singer of the following:
"Come on-a my house my house, I'm gonna give you candy /
Come on-a my house, my house, I'm gonna give a you /
Apple a plum and apricot-a too eh /
Come on-a my house, my house a come on..."

In 1986, 3 stars of this Emmy winning 1966 comedy series went on a 20th anniversary tour
Richard
Linda
Ken
2nd place: trip on Delta to New York & stay at Halloran House
New champion: $6,100
3rd place: Emerson 20" square screen stereo color television
Richard
Linda
Ken

11 R
(including 1 DD),
3 W

18 R,
5 W
(including 2 DDs)

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
